titles.title: To limit the authority of the Interstate Commerce Commission to overturn certain employee protection agreements.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1791)
Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Transportation and Hazardous Materials.

bill.summary: 8/21/1994--Introduced. Amends Federal transportation law to prohibit the Interstate Commerce Commission from using its authority in rail carrier proceedings to overturn an employee protection arrangement agreed to by all the parties to the arrangement.
